definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. not one drop of water can leak out/watertight/rigorous (argument)
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
not diluted by one drop/hundred percent
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.

sentences.english: Why don't you wish on the gargoyle?
sentences.chinese: 你不为什么不向怪兽的滴水嘴许愿？

sentences.english: Winter is a DiShuiChengBing, HaQi into frost season.
sentences.chinese: 冬天是一个滴水成冰，哈气成霜的季节。

sentences.english: Then I rake my arm across the drainboard and send the dishes to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 然后我用胳膊把滴水板上的盘子通通扫到地板上。

sentences.english: Yesterday, , we went to a big family picnic Dishuiyan Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我们一大家子去滴水岩风景区里野餐。

sentences.english: The eonstant dropping of water wears away the stone. This is Its tenacity, stamina and persistence.
sentences.chinese: 滴水穿石，这就是它的韧性。

sentences.english: In this ocean, and I am only a very small drop of water.
sentences.chinese: 在这茫茫大海之中，我只是很小的一滴水。

sentences.english: The water was actually a tear form a young riel who was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这滴水实际上是一个正在哭泣的年轻姑娘的泪水。

sentences.english: Every drop of water that melts from the ice flows into the ocean, raising sea levels.
sentences.chinese: 冰层融化成的每一滴水汇入海洋后，抬高了海平面。

sentences.english: You into the water, like little hit the banana?
sentences.chinese: 你化成滴水，是否想点点的打在芭蕉上？

sentences.english: Maybe I should ask the gargoyle.He doesn't seem to speak English.
sentences.chinese: 也许我该问问这个滴水嘴兽，看样子他不说英语。

sentences.english: The fool fills himself up with evil, even if collecting it just little by little.
sentences.chinese: 如同滴水能注满水瓶，愚人累积小恶至罪恶满盈。

sentences.english: He stacked the dishes on the draining board.
sentences.chinese: 他把碗盘放在滴水板上。

sentences.english: Rain spouts terminating in gargoyles and other grotesque creatures.
sentences.chinese: 滴水嘴和其它怪物形状的排水口。

sentences.english: If every one of us saves a drop of water, then we should clean a lake.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们每个人都节约一滴水，大家就清澈了一片湖。

sentences.english: Think of dry northwest of China, please save water.
sentences.chinese: 想想我们干涸的大西北，请珍惜每一滴水。

sentences.english: When you’re dripping wet, does your towel really absorb?
sentences.chinese: 你浑身滴水的时候，你的毛巾真能吸水吗？

definition: Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
(onom.) pattering sound/drip drip (of water)/tick tock (of clock)/also pr. [di1 da5]
